Zapraszam do kontaktu w celu uzgodnienia terminu prezentacji.
[redacted_name]
doradca ds. nieruchomości
73*******11
For sale an attractive 2-room apartment in the center of Rybnik.
In the vicinity there is everything you need - shops, schools, kindergartens, health center, market, theater, sports complex, railway station, stadium, swimming pool, Plaza shopping center, Focus, in one word: CENTER.
The apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a well-kept, intimate 3-story building from 1980's.
The area of 48 m2 consists of:
